title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.5 - Entry into areas closed to public prohibited; exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.5 - Entry into areas closed to public prohibited; exceptions

State Regulations

No person shall enter any restricted area of the truck
terminal posted as being closed to the public except: (a) persons assigned to duty
therein; (b) authorized
representatives of the Port Authority; and
(c) persons having
permission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
